fields.headline: Pretty Boy's biggest hits
fields.bodyText: Top three fights WBC super-featherweight title Las Vegas, January 20 2001 Mayweather retains title beating Diego Corrales by 10th-round TKO. Corrales was floored three times in the seventh and twice in the 10th before his corner threw in the towel. WBC light-welterweight title Atlantic City, June 25 2005 Mayweather wins title beating Arturo Gatti by sixth-round TKO. Gatti was floored in the first round, and a Mayweather masterclass forced the Canadian to retire on his stool. WBC light-middleweight title Las Vegas, May 5 2007 Mayweather wins by outpointing Oscar De La Hoya. De La Hoya faded in the later rounds as Mayweather won by split decision to become a world champion at five weights. Top three nights MTV Video Music Awards Las Vegas, September 8 2007 Britney, Diddy and Paris are at the Hard Rock Casino but Mayweather makes the biggest splash at 50 Cent's poolside rap when he throws cash into the pool. Chaos follows. Dancing With the Stars Los Angeles, October 16 2007 Fourth-round knockout in season five of the reality TV series along with partner Karina Smirnoff. But he consoles himself: "Of course I'm an icon in the sport of boxing." Flashing the cash Las Vegas, June 5 2007 On a break from training, the Vegas fighter is on the money once again, showing his deep interest in green issues with a wad of $100 bills at the Mirage casino & hotel's Jet nightclub.
